original_text: Then the priests went into the inside room of the Lord's temple to make it holy. They found some things in the temple that were unclean. They carried all those things out to the temple yard. Then the Levites took the unclean things out of the city to the Kidron Valley.
korean_text: 제사장들도 여호와의 전 안에 들어가서 깨끗하게 하여 여호와의 전에 있는 모든 더러운 것을 끌어내어 여호와의 전 뜰에 이르매 레위 사람들이 받아 바깥 기드론 시내로 가져갔더라

sentences.original_text: Then the priests went into the inside room
of the Lord's temple to make it holy
They found some things in the temple
They carried all those things out
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 모든 것들을 가지고 나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Then the Levites took the unclean things
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 레위 사람들은 그 부정한 것들을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: out of the city to the Kidron Valley
